tool_description: The Latest Startup News API is a free, reliable resource for startup news and information. It provides up-to-date data on startups, funding, innovation, and more. This API is perfect for entrepreneurs, investors, and anyone else interested in the latest happenings in the startup world.
name: Latest Startup News
title: Latest Startup News

api_list.name: Get Startup News
api_list.description: This endpoint is good for people who are interested in the latest news about startups.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-startup-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-startup-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-startup-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-startup-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
